title: Vestment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, metal
Technique: flame (brick, Florentine, bargello) stitch embroidery on loosely woven canvas bound together by silver trimming; lined
description: Panels of loosely woven linen canvas bound together by silver trimming, and solidly embroidered in bright polychrome silk floss in flame (brick, Florentine, bargello) sittch. Lined with old natural linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vestment, 18th century.Medium: silk, linen, metal
Technique: flame (brick, Florentine, bargello) stitch embroidery on loosely woven canvas bound together by silver trimming; lined. 1960-85-2.
